name: Adult Green Dragon
lore: Green dragons are cunning manipulators who revel in deception and subjugation. They dwell in ancient forests, claiming vast stretches of woodland as their domains. A green dragon delights in corrupting and controlling other creatures, bending lesser beings to its will through a combination of intimidation, bribery, and manipulation. Its poisonous breath can fell entire groups of enemies, and its mastery of the forest makes its lair a deadly maze of thorns, poison, and treachery.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance
traits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace one Bite attack with a use of Frightful Presence.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +11, reach 10 ft. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +11, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to this dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

savingThrow.targets: each creature of the dragon's choice within 120 feet that is aware of it

onSuccess.effects: The condition ends on the creature.
The creature is immune to this dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 60-foot Cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) Poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Detect
actions.description: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

actions.name: Tail Attack
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +11, reach 15 ft. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Wing Attack
actions.description: Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage and have the Prone condition. The dragon can then Fly up to half its Fly Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

savingThrow.targets: each creature within 15 feet of the dragon

lair.description: A green dragon lairs in the ancient forests of the world. Its lair is typically a complex of caves and tunnels beneath a forest canopy, shrouded in thick undergrowth and poisonous plants. The air in and around the lair is thick with the stench of decay and poison.

actions.name: Grasping Roots
actions.description: Grasping roots and vines erupt in a 20-foot radius centered on a point on the ground that the dragon can see within 120 feet of it. That area becomes Difficult Terrain, and each creature there must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or have the Restrained condition until the next initiative count 20. A Restrained creature can use an action to make a DC 16 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself on a success.

conditions.duration: until initiative count 20 of the next round

actions.name: Poisonous Fog
actions.description: A bank of fog fills a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the dragon can see within 120 feet of it. The Sphere spreads around corners and its area is Lightly Obscured. Each creature in the fog must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

conditions.duration: until the end of its next turn

actions.name: Beguiling Whisper
actions.description: The dragon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition until the next initiative count 20. While Charmed in this way, the creature regards the dragon as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected.

conditions.duration: until initiative count 20 of the next round

regionalEffects.description: Thickets of thorny plants grow within 1 mile of the lair, creating Difficult Terrain in the forests there.
regionalEffects.endCondition: The effect fades over 1d10 days if the dragon dies.

regionalEffects.description: Fog lightly obscures the land within 6 miles of the lair.
regionalEffects.endCondition: The effect ends immediately if the dragon dies.

regionalEffects.description: Beasts within 1 mile of the lair that have an Intelligence score of 3 or lower are charmed by the dragon and act as its eyes and ears, alerting it to intruders.
regionalEffects.endCondition: The effect ends immediately if the dragon dies.
